WHUK (Webhosting UK Com Ltd.), one of the leading web hosting providers in the UK since 2001, has announced a range of Christmas promotions and savings on a wide-range of products and services, with discounts of up to 50% to take advantage of.
The company announced new and existing customers can take advantage of 50% off the purchase price on new orders on select web hosting products, with many other products on offer at great prices.


Following is a brief summary of the deals available:

  • Dedicated Servers: Flat 10 % discount off on all new server orders for the first invoice with UK based servers starting from as low as £49.50
  • Cloud Hosting: Flat 10% OFF on both VMware and Hyper-V based cloud servers. Plans now starts from as low as £30.
  • VPS Hosting: 15% OFF the first invoice on purchase of a Linux or Windows VPS hosting plan.
  • Reseller Hosting: Get up to 4 months Reseller Hosting for free with discounts up to £60 on the company's range of reseller hosting plans.
  • Shared Hosting: Grab a FREE domain name with every plan when you purchase it on an annual or biennial billing period.
  • WordPress Hosting: Get 50% off the first invoice on any WordPress Hosting plan – with plans starting from as low as £20 for the first year – equivalent to just £1.66 per month!
For complete information visit – WHUK’s X’mas Web Hosting deals and discounts official web page
